title: I-539 | Application to Extend/Change Nonimmigrant Status
description: The following groups use this form: Certain nonimmigrants extending their stay or changing to another nonimmigrant status; CNMI residents applying for an initial grant of status; F and M nonimmigrants applying for reinstatement; and, Persons seeking V nonimmigrant status or an extension of stay as a V nonimmigrant.

forms.title: Instructions for Form I-539 and Supplemental Form I-539A
Form M-752, Helpful Filing Tips for Form I-539
